description: This is a Dart source file defining the AppState class for a Flutter application. It manages the application's vocabulary, phrases, user preferences such as favorites and learned items, and quiz functionality through ChangeNotifier. The file includes data models, state management, persistence, and quiz logic.

classes.name: AppState
classes.description: Central application state managing vocabulary, phrases, user preferences, and quiz functionalities using ChangeNotifier.

classes.name: QuizQuestionView
classes.description: Public-facing view class for quiz questions to expose only necessary information.

methods.name: _init
methods.description: Initializes SharedPreferences and loads favorites and learned items from storage.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Saves current favorites and learned items to SharedPreferences.

methods.name: toggleFavorite
methods.description: Toggles whether an item is marked as favorite.

methods.name: toggleLearned
methods.description: Toggles whether an item is marked as learned.

methods.name: restartQuiz
methods.description: Resets quiz state and generates new questions.

methods.name: answer
methods.description: Records an answer choice for the current question.

methods.name: nextQuestion
methods.description: Advances to the next quiz question.

methods.name: currentQuestion
methods.description: Returns the current quiz question in a view-only format.
